name: Black and White Photos by Pelin Genc

metadata.name: The Spiral
metadata.description:
I took this photo in one of my travels in a beautifully designed building. I was there to have a cup of coffee and spend some lovely time with my friend. 

As soon as we entered the building, we were both fascinated by the decoration and the design, which was a combination of a historical architectural structure with modern interior design. And we started taking photos of the place before having our coffee. 

The stairs looked so striking as I held my head and looked up. They looked like a spiral going all the way up to the sky and sunlight was filling in from the rear windows and the ceiling. The view immediately gave me a feeling of infinity. At that moment, I felt how light can brighten up any place, spread to every corner even though it diffuses through a narrow opening and lift our mood.

Luckily, I had my camera and my wide-angle lens with me. I started looking for the best spot I could use the light and capture the geometrical form and its depth properly. 

Then we had our coffee enjoying this beautiful place and it remains as a lovely memory for me.
